actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: The dragon exhales a cloud of spores in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 5 (1d10) psychic damage, and it is frightened of the dragon for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage with no additional effects. A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
actions.name: Nightmare Breath (Recharge 5-6)
